p: Optimists, on the other hand, may point at well-known historical examples such as the British movement for abolition of slavery, Gandhi’s movement against British colonialism in India, women’s rights movement, and the workers’ movement in the nineteenth and twentieth centuries. These activist movements were successful in many respects and show that people can come together, create awareness, and initiate action with snowball effects that change society. This indicates that also climate activism might be successful.
